title: Im looking for a team
body: Hi, I am 18 and live in Melbourne, I am looking for serious ranked team. I main ADC and i can play anyday pretty much. hit me up in game if i would be able to join your team. {{champion:429}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:15}}

replies.body: Add me, you can join our team Down to Urf. We haven't lost a game yet and one of our members stopped playing so we need someone else.
Soz I am better than you.
Yo, not in front of the fans!

1. hey my ign is kaiyunman im plat 5 ranked and i need a adc but we only want you to play graves is that ok. Also if you join our team our support is not that good so you have to be good. i main top{{champion:64}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}}
